categories.title: 1X Single-Stage Snow Blowers
categories.p: Engineered to use a high-performance auger to quickly and easily remove up to 6 inches of snow from small, smooth areas.

categories.title: 2X Two-Stage Snow Blowers
categories.p: Engineered for clearing between 12-18 inches in powder and slush. If you measure snow in feet instead of inches, step up to the commercial-grade features on the 2X MAX.

categories.title: 3X Three-Stage Snow Blowers
categories.p: Engineered to clear deep snowfall faster than 2X models with its patented three-stage system. Designed to easily remove up to 23 inches of snowfall and bust through tough snow barriers.
